title: Lost keys
body:
Hi,

It is the second time it happen to me! I forged 3 key then it disapear! Can someone help me?

IamPronT

replies.body: I dug into your hextech loot, and it looks like you were able to forge that key and then use it to open a chest which had Nightmare Tryndamere. Keep in mind that whenever you forge a key out of fragments, that key doesn't show up in your loot as an item like skin shards. Forged keys will show up at the bottom in your currency with your essence.
